Text:
This version worked great. However, I recommend NOT running DriverEasy before running the keygen. Once you run the keygen and crack successfully, run DriverEasy and then update.

As for the "Speed Limited" that is said at the bottom of the application, "Professional(Speed Limited), that is because this is not an official released version. It is a version that has been modified and released on the Internet by a third party, which, in some places, is called a cracked version. As they must pay expensive server bandwidth fees, they can only offer the dedicate server with the paid Professional Version, for users to enjoy high-speed download services. The Professional (Speed Limited) and Free Version utilize a similar download server and bandwidth.
